name: Divine Evolution
summary: The divine might provided by your bloodline flows through you.
description:
The divine might provided by your bloodline flows through you. You gain an additional spell slot of your highest level, which you can use only to cast your choice of heal or harm. You can cast either of these spells using that spell slot, even if they arenâ€™t in your spell repertoire.Divine Evolution Leads To...

Greater Spiritual Evolution, Greater Vital EvolutionTraitsDivine: This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.
